website_summaries.verdict: Top choice for tall people who want full-length leggings.
pros: Truly ankle length for those who are above average height
Inner zip pouch can hold cards, keys, and phone
Many say these feel like Lululemon, at a fraction of the cost
Extra marks for amazing customer service
cons: Wash carefully – ideally inside out – on a gentle cycle in cold water

customer_reviews.title: Affordable leggings
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are super stretchy and soft. I do a lot of cardio at the gym and they fit like a glove. I’m 5’1 and I weigh 215 & got size medium. I love that they are squat proof cause of my booty. Get them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect leggings, I want all the colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these leggings fit. They are high over the tummy for some control and they are tight all the way to the ankle. I am 5'7" and I love the length. They stop at my ankle with a little extra. They are super comfy. I plan to order more colors. At first I ordered a small but it felt they were too tight. The medium is perfect. I'm 5'7" and 128 lbs. I do have a little bit of a mommy tummy and a larger bum so the medium fits great.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing leggings, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Super high waisted! I ordered a size down bc I wanted some extreme compression and my other leggings have been getting very loose over time. The compression is verrrrry tight at this point (they were hard to get on) but the tummy control is real! I would say if you order your true size they should still have a good amount of squeeze but if you are between sizes and want some serious compression then you should still be able to be comfortable in a size down. I really love these leggings. They are also pretty soft. My only wish is that they had a side pocket but the hidden pocket is pretty big so at least there is that.
customer_reviews.author: Genaro Mapula

customer_reviews.title: Give them a try! Lululemon dupes! High waisted & don’t roll down!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are THE BEST! I don’t own a pair of Lululemon leggings but was looking for a dupe and these are definitely it. They’re very soft, do not roll down at all, are very high waisted, and are squat proof. Only thing is they are a bit looser than expected so the compression is not as tight. I’m still thoroughly happy with them! They arrived early and came with a bonus shirt that was equally as soft and comfortable. Definitely recommend giving these a try! They have replaced my Old Navy tights.. just need pockets now!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Franco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, love these leggings! They are excellent for postpartum. Great amount of compression and they are super comfortable! I feel confident and well supported in these leggings. I actually bought size medium as my goal pants to get into. I can already fit them. My others are size large. I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: EmJayLuv

customer_reviews.title: Favorite out of amazon legging choices!
customer_reviews.text: Love how smooth the material is, fits nice and the high waist is perfect! Just enough compression! I’m 5’2 about 140 lbs and I bought a medium. Had difficulty choosing between these, and a few other amazon best sellers, after wearing them all I already ordered more of these! If your undecided just buy & try 💙
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Aren’t see-through!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They fit so perfect and aren’t see-through! I’m getting them in every color Lol
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Annoying piling
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these leggings so bad. They fit great felt great love the high waist and compression but after a couple of washes the piling is way too much. More than any other leggings I own. So had it not have been for the annoying piling I would’ve given this a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: HerrMama

customer_reviews.title: Extreme high waisted! Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them so far. Especially how high waisted they are. Very comfortable. I ended up buying small & medium because I couldn’t decide & I honestly like both sizes. They run true to size. I’m usually a small but the medium is more comfortable. Only annoying thing is hand washing them but it is what it is. Curious if anyone else has washed them in the washer & turned out okay?
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Best leggings!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! I have way too many pairs that just sit it the drawer either fits weird or see through. These are amazing, they are not see through at all! I own the black and bright blue and both have the same consistency for both size and quality. I’m ordering every color and more black. They fit as expected. For reference I am 5’5.5, 145lbs and a medium fits great.
customer_reviews.author: GLADFam88

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for short girls
customer_reviews.text: The materials of these leggings are AMAZING BUT I️m a short gal. 5’1 weight 135. These leggings are not meant for short girls. The band is too high so I️ have to roll down which sucks when I’m working out andddd the length of pants are too long. I️ always have to roll up. For short girls I️ recommend agonvin leggings from amazon. Same exact material just firs my body type better.
customer_reviews.author: genesis

customer_reviews.title: Dont believe the review photos!  Regular colored underwear can EASILY be seen through these thin pants!
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is soft, fit was perfect but VERY SEE THROUGH! The other reviewer who bent over in front of the mirror must have not been wearing underwear or wearing nude color because my medium blue underwear were VERY apparent while STANDING UP in these stone colored pants. I am 5'6", 150 lbs with 37-29-39 measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice workout pants for the price. I am still waiting to see how they hold up. The high waist slipped down a bit through the day and I would have like the pants to have a bit more stretch around my lower legs where they felt tighter than some of my other higher name brand pants. But for under $30 I am keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Likes to workout

customer_reviews.title: TALL GIRLS, FEAR NOT
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked. All the reviews I saw that commented on the length of these leggings were from girls on the shorter side. I'm 5'11" so I was half expecting these to end up hitting me mid calf, but I got the standard black ones in medium and they're perfect! For reference, I'm 135lbs and wear a size 27/size 4L in pants.
customer_reviews.author: LenaKSW

customer_reviews.title: Not dressy at all, very shiny
customer_reviews.text: Very shiny, athletic looking legging, not for me, looking more for an everyday style. Black is very washed out and not very dark. Fit was okay, but sending back. For reference, I’m 5”8’, 150lbs and large fit best.
customer_reviews.author: Goldess

customer_reviews.title: Go true to size
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9” and have an athletic build. I usually get a small in leggings just to add some more compression but i got a medium. These were more compressing in the legs and a tiny bit more loose in the stomach area. They have an elastic waistband and a top seam. They have a more athletic feel rather than a brushed or buttery soft texture. The waist comes up super nice and high and the length was perfect too. I think a small would’ve need too tight on my legs and too short so glad I got a medium!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are the truth. I did the bend over and touch my toes test and they kept everything hidden. I typically don’t even do reviews but I had to do a review for these. They are diff Lululemon quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are great. They are comfortable and high waisted which I love. The fabric is not shiny and weird like some leggings so they can be worn with normal clothes as opposed to just the gym. The reason I gave four stars is because they are too wide at the ankles.
customer_reviews.author: krho

customer_reviews.title: Great for a hard workout!
customer_reviews.text: I do intense exercise on a regular basis and these have held up great. I have a couple pair of expensive leggings and I reach for these before the others now. They feel great, they are squat proof and they go with anything I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: I am obsessed with Queenieke!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am at the gym every single day so a good high waisted leggings is essential! These are amazing!!!!! The closest I’ve ever found to Gymshark and I’m obsessed.. I ordered a medium. I’m 5’2 and about 150lbs right now. Hopefully that helps somebody for size reference. I ordered the matching sports bra and it’s super cute and fits like a glove. (Also in Medium) just ordered my second color, completely in love and great price!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Vivi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUT RETURNING FOR A SMALLER SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE GREAT!! IM ONLY EXCHANGING FOR A SMALLER SIZE. LOVE THE HIGH WAIST AND THE SHAPING IT PROVIDES. I RECOMMEND THESE LEGGINGS ALL YEAR ROUND!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: Company sizing mistake? /:
customer_reviews.text: The quality & feel of these is great, the only thing that kind of upset me was that I ordered a medium & I got a small... The bag has a medium sticker, the tag says medium BUT the pants are actually a small lol!! So they’re more snug than I’d like them to be... They have good amount of stretch & all but I still prefer my proper size. I understand mistakes like this happen but I can’t help but to feel a little annoyed!! Company reached out to me & sent me my proper size!! I’m impressed with their customer service!! Thank you Queenie Ke!! ((:
customer_reviews.author: Amy Olivia Pereira

customer_reviews.title: i'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for good quality leggings that aren't outrageously expensive - because it was always one or the other: either good quality, but too expensive or cheap, both in price and quality. Luckily, my search is over. These leggings are wonderful quality and reasonably priced. LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: fanya ginzburg

customer_reviews.title: Squat proof - just too high waisted for liking
customer_reviews.text: I like the fabric a lot. I didn’t realize how high waisted they would be though. I ordered the black and grey pair and i will be sending them back. The black already has a seam coming undone and I JUST opened the package. I’m a size 6 in lulus and a medium in most leggings. They fit well just too high waisted for my liking. Also - They were 100% squat proof and feel similar to wunder unders. I may try to order them in a mid length waist rise.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: They're alright but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Size and quality is great, but the top was very tight on my stomach and made me feel uncomfortable all day. Probably great if you're fit and in shape but definitely squeezed my stomach out at the top. I'm 5'4 and 127lbs for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Rae B.

customer_reviews.title: They fit great but they’re for TALL people
customer_reviews.text: They fit great but they’re for TALL people. I am 5’4” and they covered my entire foot and then probably three more inches past my toes 😂 you’ll need them altered if you’re an average height
customer_reviews.author: Colette Kradin

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last
customer_reviews.text: When I first received these leggings I had got a pair with A LOT of loose threads and pilling. I messaged the seller, they sent a replacement once I sent them back. The second pair was great at first but, after only 2 wears they're already falling apart. Won't be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Abril Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: its okay for its price, the fabric is strechy, dont recond putting it in the dry dryer. let it air dry
customer_reviews.author: gless madison

customer_reviews.title: Digs into waist
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 5' 155lbs and I have some extra fat around my mid section. these are high wasted which is comfortable, however, there's a small elastic seam at the top that digs in and results in my love handles and lower belly pooch to actually be extenuated instead of compressed. this is my own complaint bc otherwise theyre comfortable and dont give a camel toe. i think if i were leaner it wouldnt bother me as much
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pants!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t stop buying these! The fit is flattering, the material is thick, and they never sag. The high waist is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Dr PK

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great material, squat proof, comfortable, highrise, and no cameltoe. Awesome leggings. They are so soft and do not irritate my skin. These are the smoothest leggings I currently own and will definitely be purchasing more soon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Del Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super love these-very flattering and very comfortable to work out in!
customer_reviews.author: Ketomary71

customer_reviews.title: best leggings on Amazon so far
customer_reviews.text: Love these leggings!! I heard about them through HOPESCOPE on YouTube. They are long enough for legs, have a tight waist band and are super smooth. Love the way they feel. Also squat proof. Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maddi

customer_reviews.title: Amazong!!
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing leggings squat proof, I wear them for work (I work at a gym) I have gotten bleach on them and nothing happened! Fit is amazing love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Extra High Rib Huggers, Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, sturdy leggings. The extra high waist hits a bit higher than I was expecting (around the bottom of my ribs), but they are true to the photos and description.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit thick band
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these , thick band holds stomach flat and very flattering
customer_reviews.author: McKay fleming

customer_reviews.title: Nice leggings
customer_reviews.text: Good product. They fit really well. Nice fabric. Great quality for the price. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A

customer_reviews.title: Slimming, but restricting
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sucks everything in. When I first took them out of the bag I thought there was no way i was getting them over my thighs, but with some wiggling they really slimmed me. VERY high waisted. I'm 5'4 and got a medium and they went all the way up to right under my breasts. Only problem I find is a little camel toe, but with some adjusting is bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bush

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of these were defective, but the replacement pair (great customer service) seems to be fine. I really love how high waisted these are, I have a lot of issues with my leggings rolling down over my mom pudge when I do yoga.
customer_reviews.author: krispy

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cothing purchase online. I'm 5.6 for 138 pounds and I bought the medium size. It fit very well, even if I was'nt sure what to choose between medium and small size. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings, they fit great and are squat proof as long as you order the correct size, they’re very high waisted and a little tight on the waist so it wouldn’t be a bad idea to order a size bigger but ultimately a great product and I even reordered them and haven’t had any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Get the next size up.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend getting a size bigger then you normally would. I’m regularly a size medium but they fit like a small. Other then that the material and wear was good just needed to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: I do hot yoga and some of the classes, the teachers have you moving like crazy between forms so I was so freaking annoyed having to always pull up my pants every time. These are AMAZING! A little snug but that could be from the quarantine eating, ha.
customer_reviews.author: NatG

customer_reviews.title: Not squat proof
customer_reviews.text: I do like these leggings but they are slightly see through. They are very comfy though so I will still wear them around the house or with tunics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for girls with skinny ankles! But quality was there!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pants but if you have skinny ankles they are huge! Returned them with a full refund so customer service is a 5!
customer_reviews.author: stacy kessler

customer_reviews.title: Loveee
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings! These leggings are comfy and look nice. Also, they are run proof and squat proof, the sweat is a little visible; However, I recommend these leggings, amazing overall.
customer_reviews.author: solziitoh8

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got my normal size medium and they are nice and snug in the tummy region which is what I wanted I'm 5'4" about 155 waist 32" hips 42" They are just a little ling for my legs but I can adjust them to look fine
customer_reviews.author: candyce

customer_reviews.title: These Legging are great
customer_reviews.text: I have only wore them once but I really like them! As long as these hold up I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mom tummy control
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these. I’m a mom of two and it’s hard to find leggings that control all of my love handles and tummy. Until now these are amazing. Will deff be showing people these to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bend n snap
customer_reviews.text: These pants make my Butt looks super awesome, hell yeah
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I read that they were comparable to Lulemon but I felt that was a little over hype. They run a little small and they are more of a spandex feel than what I was expected
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Brown

customer_reviews.title: Favorites!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are everything! I love them! High waisted and stay in place when you run, lift, yoga or just to wear around. They are not see thru and great quality material!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pass the squat test
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and felt nice, but very see-through when squatting in the black color.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Flattering
customer_reviews.text: Look at size chart it is true to size. These leggings are such a nice material! They fit nicely and are flattering. Very wasted and hold everything in! I hate spending money on clothes but will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Good leggings but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These leggings feel great except that there’s an elastic waistband that kind of digs into your abdomen and doesn’t look flattering. I wouldn’t buy these if you’re looking for tummy control.
customer_reviews.author: chillsince93

customer_reviews.title: Great pants and price
customer_reviews.text: Great for boot camp-super high waisted like pictured. I'm 5’ 6 and 134lbs I usually wear a small in work out pants or a 4 or 6. The small fits perfectly with a little room.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These came super fast and I live the product. The material is great and not see through at all, and the size is perfect. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: B.Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Best fit, the most comfort, for the best price
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting to write this review until I was able to workout in these leggings and, wow. I love these! I was so hesitant because I’m a giant legging snob but these are the most comfortable, supportive leggings I have ever had. They didn’t fall down or slip at all during my run, or during my leg workout. I’m buying these in every color.
customer_reviews.author: Keni

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants very nice material and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tristimally13

customer_reviews.title: The product fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 pair of workout pants and 5 workout tops. I would recommend these products highly. I am 5’9 and I wear a medium pant and they fit perfect. I am getting rid of all other workout pants as these by far are my favorites. Don’t stretch out, wash well and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality leggings I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of these leggings. My complaint is the elastic band at the top of the waist band which really isn't bad, just not ideal. I also should have sized down. they don't really offer a lot of tummy control because the waist is too large.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Expected them to be a bit baggier
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to fit a little baggier than they actually fit, however they are still very flattering and comfortable. They fit like baggy leggings
customer_reviews.author: DLD

customer_reviews.title: Feels awesome
customer_reviews.text: Runs a tab not big but absolutely loved them gonna order more soon
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: They are everything.
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings. They are compression and suck everything in. Looks amazing on and high waisted. I love these for when I want to look snatched ☺️💕💕
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. Fabric has no stretch. Seams ripped just from handling before trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer harker

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality and I love them. I just wish I would have gone up one size. I read all the reviews and alot of people said that they run a little bit big but I disagree. I wear a size 6 sometimes 8 so I figured medium would be good but they are a little tight around the waistband
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute full coverage leggings
customer_reviews.text: I like the flattering fit and comfort these leggings offer. The black pair tend fade and attract lent.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Delapena

customer_reviews.title: Runs a size too small.
customer_reviews.text: Loved how soft and comfy they felt. But I would recommend going up a size for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE how high waisted these are! They fit true to size and the material is awesome. Definitely recommend! Got a size medium
customer_reviews.author: Haylee

customer_reviews.title: Black color is see through
customer_reviews.text: Loved the feeling and fit of these but the black are TOTALLY see through. Besides that these leggings feel amazing. I sent them back and plan on ordering a different color in hopes they aren’t see through.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The high waste is perfect. Keeps me tucked in. They wash well. I ordered 2 pair a year and they still look brand new
customer_reviews.author: cheryl m.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft this legging feels. It is very flexible and comfortable. I will certainly purchase this bland again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for me but it traps dust easily. I prefer 90 degrees high waist leggings
customer_reviews.author: Prasheena Chettiar

customer_reviews.title: Ordered another pair
customer_reviews.text: Love the high waist 👍🏻 Good material and fits just right ..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !
customer_reviews.text: They r perfect tucks in the gut like u want doesn't roll down ... Yay
customer_reviews.author: Megan M Ehlers

customer_reviews.title: Great leg day leggings
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. I always wear these for leg day at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Crespo

product_meta.title: QUEENIEKE Women Yoga Leggings High Waist Running Pants Workout Tights 60129
feature_bullets: ❤SOLID:75% polyester 25% spandex, SPACE DYE: 87% Polyester 13% Spandex

❤[Update] new fabric and seamless waist: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07X347JP5?ref=myi_title_dp❤[Tummy Control] High-Rise keeps you feeling covered and secure. Also it lies flat to your skin and won't dig in.
❤[Fabric] Sports leggings use four-way stretch fabric is sweat-wicking and offers great support and coverage with a cool, smooth feel. So you can bend, squat, stretch or do any pose you want.
❤[Hidden Pocket] Hidden pocket in back waistband holds a key, cards and phone including iphone plus, so you can focus on your runs—not your gear.
❤[Design For]You can wear them to do yoga, to run or to go to gym. In addition, you can also wear them at home as a home clothes or go out for a picnic.
❤[hand-wash better]QUEENEIEKE 100% GUARANTEE + 5-STAR SERVICE- If you don't love our products, simply return them without question within 30 days.
